full_summary:
# Tender Announcement

## Title

* **English:** Interconnect Cables
* **French:** Cables d'interconnexion

## Contract Details

* **Contract Number:** CB-6602-44659289
* **Contract Amendment Number:** 1
* **Contract Solicitation Number:** W8486-247140/A
* **Publication Date:** June 21, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date:** August 2, 2023, 2:00 p.m. (EDT)
* **Amendment Date:** August 2, 2023

## Contract Overview

The Department of National Defence (DND) has issued a Request for Proposal (RFP) for the procurement of interconnect cables. The required items are detailed in Annex A of the solicitation. The proposed contract is for delivery of the goods to 7 Canadian Forces Support Division (CFSD) in Edmonton, Alberta.

## Contract Details

* **Procurement Category:** Goods and Services (G and S)
* **Procurement Method:** Competitive - Open Bidding
* **Selection Criteria:** Lowest Price

## Trade Agreements

The contract is subject to various trade agreements, including:

* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)

## Contact Information

To obtain additional information about the contract, please contact:

* Danny Ouellette
* Phone: (343) 542-6774
* Email: Danny.Ouellette@forces.gc.ca
* Address: National Defence Headquarters, Ottawa, ON, Canada

## Tender Documents

To access the tender documents, please visit the Canada Buys website at [https://canadabuys.canada.casites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/6602/w8486-247140_a---rfp---english.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/6602/w8486-247140_a---rfp---english
